content:
That sounds wonderful! Bike lanes along the waterfront can be such a treat, especially with the scenic views and the fresh air. It's great that you're taking advantage of them to explore your new city and discover new spots.

There's something about cycling that makes you more connected to your surroundings, isn't there? You get to notice details that you might miss when driving or taking public transportation, like street art, architecture, or even just the sounds and smells of the area.

And, of course, finding new coffee shops and cafes is always a bonus! Cycling and coffee seem to go hand-in-hand, don't they? Do you have a favorite coffee spot that you've discovered on your rides so far?

Also, have you noticed any interesting landmarks or attractions along your waterfront route that you'd recommend checking out?
